name: See Saw
description:
Tap or left  mouse click to make See Saw the bird flap.

Once See Saw hits the right or left side of the screen she gets a wind boost.

The faster you're flying when u hit the side of the screen the more powerful your wind boost!

See how high you can go!

Sound FX from Banjo Kazooie.

Don't hit a cloud or fall to the bottom of the screen.
